bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: cold malaria affecting the four limbs

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with si zhi ni leng 四肢逆冷 , counterflow with cold in the four limbs. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry ta gan 獺肝：主傳屍勞極，四肢寒瘧，虛汗客熱 , “It controls corpse [evil] transmission with extreme exhaustion, cold malaria affecting the four limbs , and depletion sweating with visitor heat”.
